full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement - Contract #W6837-224748C Janitorial Services

## Contract Summary

* Solicitation Number: WS4603074553
* Publication Date: 24 May 2024
* Tender Closing Date: 24 June 2024 (14:00:00 HAE)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 01 September 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 August 2025

## Contract Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Janitorial Services at 12 buildings on Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Kingston, Ontario. 

## Scope of Work

The successful bidder will provide janitorial services, including cleaning and janitorial services for the facilities, as described in the Statement of Work (Annex).

## Solicitation Details

* The solicitation is open to Indigenous and non-Indigenous Janitorial Companies.
* Bidders must submit their offer by 24 June 2024 (14:00:00 HAE) on Ariba Discovery (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19812223?extsite=MTk4MTIyMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

## Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

## Supporting Documentation

* Bidders must provide a complete bid package including all required supporting documentation in accordance with the solicitation instructions.

## Trade Agreements

* This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements: 
 * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
 * Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
 * Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
 * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
 * Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
 * Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
 * North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
 * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
 * Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
 * Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
 * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
 * Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
 * Canada-UK
